forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a cool tranquility prevails. The skies are partly cloudy, with hints of light struggling to pierce through the lingering veil of night. A gentle breeze whispers through the streets, carrying with it the promise of a mild day ahead. Settle into the comforting embrace of a cozy sweater or light jacket, as the morning chill crawls toward 47 degrees, before the afternoon offers a pleasant respite, nudging temperatures near 65.

The day unfolding will be predominantly sunny, though the afternoon may greet us with a subtle shift, as the warmth recedes to a comfortable 60 degrees. While there are no immediate signs of the infamous fog that often blankets this area, the edges of the city may wear a light mist that dances along the waterfront—silent and serene. As the sun rises higher, the clarity of the day will reveal stunning views, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment in one of the many parks. Embrace a simple café visit with a warm beverage, allowing the day to reveal its charm in unhurried exploration.
